dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Footage from Akorda shows the official welcome for Rwandan President Paul Kagame in Astana.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Footage from Akorda shows the official welcome for Rwandan President Paul Kagame in Astana.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The press service of Akorda has released footage of the official welcoming ceremony for Rwandan President Paul Kagame, who arrived in Astana on an official visit.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, right, he arrived on May 28th for that visit, didn't he? The ceremony was at the presidential residence.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, right, he arrived on May twenty eighth for that visit, didn't he? The ceremony was at the presidential residence.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The ceremony took place on May 28 at the presidential residence in the capital.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and they had the full honors—commander of the guard giving a report, anthems played, the works.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and they had the full honors-commander of the guard giving a report, anthems played, the works.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The commander of the honour guard company delivered a welcome report to the presidents. The national anthems of Kazakhstan and Rwanda were also performed.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: I mean, it's a pretty big deal. They're planning to sign several agreements during these talks.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I mean, it's a pretty big deal. They're planning to sign several agreements during these talks.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The two sides are also expected to sign several agreements.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. President Kagame and President Tokayev are discussing bilateral cooperation prospects, which is huge for both nations.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. President Kagame and President Tokayev are discussing bilateral cooperation prospects, which is huge for both nations.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, it was reported that President Kagame would hold talks with Kazakh President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev to discuss the prospects for bilateral cooperation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: You know, it's interesting—Rwanda and Kazakhstan aren't typical partners you hear about every day.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You know, it's interesting-Rwanda and Kazakhstan aren't typical partners you hear about every day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! That's what makes this visit so noteworthy. It feels like they're really trying to expand their diplomatic reach.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! That's what makes this visit so noteworthy. It feels like they're really trying to expand their diplomatic reach.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And introducing the delegations too—shows they're serious about building those connections on multiple levels.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And introducing the delegations too-shows they're serious about building those connections on multiple levels.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the event, the heads of state introduced members of their respective delegations.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. I wonder what sectors they're focusing on… trade, maybe technology or agriculture?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. I wonder what sectors they're focusing on... trade, maybe technology or agriculture?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Could be. Rwanda's been pushing innovation, and Kazakhstan has resources and infrastructure to offer.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Could be. Rwanda's been pushing innovation, and Kazakhstan has resources and infrastructure to offer.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Plus, holding it at Akorda—that's the symbol of presidential power there. Really sets the tone.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Plus, holding it at Akorda-that's the symbol of presidential power there. Really sets the tone.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely a strong message about how important this partnership is to both sides.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely a strong message about how important this partnership is to both sides.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Looking forward to seeing what comes out of those agreements once they're signed.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Looking forward to seeing what comes out of those agreements once they're signed.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Same here. Might open up some new opportunities for collaboration in the region.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Same here. Might open up some new opportunities for collaboration in the region.
